sentences.english: Jiangnan porcelain place, nature has a strong tea.
sentences.chinese: 江南有陶瓷的地方，自然有着浓郁的茶香。

sentences.english: The Rapel Valley weather ripened fruit slowly , and Cabernet Sauvignon developed intense flavours.
sentences.chinese: 兰佩谷的气候使得葡萄成熟缓慢，并带有浓郁的香气。

sentences.english: Taste mellow and deep, rich wine, lingering aftertaste and balance.
sentences.chinese: 口感醇厚深邃，酒香浓郁，回味绵长而均衡。

sentences.english: It is the emblematic red grape of Argentinean. Pleasant aroma to raspberries, cherries and plums with intense purple color.
sentences.chinese: 果香怡人，树莓，樱桃和李子的芬芳浓郁，呈酱紫色。

sentences.english: Ample and complex on the palate. It reveals fresh and generous fruit.
sentences.chinese: 口感饱满复杂，带有浓郁的新鲜水果味。

sentences.english: The dish is usually served with a rich onion gravy.
sentences.chinese: 这道菜通常都和浓郁的洋葱肉汁一起食用。

sentences.english: The black tea tastes strong and promotes digestion.
sentences.chinese: 红茶茶味浓郁，有助消化。

sentences.english: Indulge in the supreme treat of rich cream and morsels of macapuno.
sentences.chinese: 该冰淇淋让人沉醉于浓郁的奶香和点点椰肉间。

sentences.english: Features Xiantian moderate Maotai rich, unique flavor.
sentences.chinese: 特点咸甜适中，酱香浓郁，风味独特。

sentences.english: The smell of money with copper, is his whole life meaning.
sentences.chinese: 那铜臭味浓郁的金钱，才是他全部生命意义所在。

sentences.english: The sensory properties of mulberry wine were its soft taste and strong and mellow aroma.
sentences.chinese: 桑椹酒感官特征为醇香浓郁，口感柔和。

sentences.english: Ricotta cheese in cream sauce with the thinly sliced potato.
sentences.chinese: 马铃薯和法式白酱加上口感浓郁的瑞卡达起司。

sentences.english: The pickled vegetable of bottled coriander heart is convenient and high quality.
sentences.chinese: 瓶装香菜心酱菜，香味浓郁，脆爽可口，是方便。

sentences.english: Fresh but not dense, it is the unique characteristic of the green color around the Namelss now.
sentences.chinese: 新鲜而不显浓郁，是眼下时节未名之绿特有的风格。

sentences.english: The whole building is unique in sculpt and delicacy in carving skill, having strong feeling of Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 整座建筑造型别致，雕工精巧，具有浓郁的元代风格。

sentences.english: A lol of Passage of Wei Book, which were rich and colorful, were full of features of short story.
sentences.chinese: 纬书内容丰富博杂，许多纬书片断具有浓郁的小说性。

definition: dense/thick (fog, clouds etc)/to have a strong interest in/deep/fully saturated (color)
